description: The pilot requests permission to start the engines.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request startup
calls.message: {JSR GRD}, {Call Sign}, request startup.

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.caption: Startup approved
calls.message: {Call Sign}, startup approved, temp 32, {time 23}.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm startup
calls.message: Startup approved, temp 32, {time 23}, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot requests permission to taxi to the runway.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request taxi
calls.message: {JSR GRD}, {Call Sign}, request taxi.

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.caption: Taxi to holding point
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR GRD}, {taxi via O-P-M} to holding point Rwy-16, {QNH 746}.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm taxi
calls.message: {QNH 746}, squawk 4154, {Taxi via O-P-M} to holding point Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports approaching a taxiway line and requests to change to the tower frequency.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request change to tower
calls.message: {JSR GRD}, {Call Sign}, approaching M, like to change to tower.

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.caption: Contact tower
calls.message: {Call Sign}, contact tower 123.2.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm contact tower
calls.message: Contact tower 123.2, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot requests permission to enter the runway and wait for takeoff clearance.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request lineup
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, request lineup.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Lineup and wait
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, lineup Rwy-16, report ready for departure.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm lineup
calls.message: Lining up Rwy-16, call you ready for departure, {Call Sign}.

description: A pilot makes this call to the tower controller to get permission to move onto the runway and prepare for takeoff to fly a local circuit (a repeating pattern of flight around the airport).

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request line up for circuit
calls.message: {JSR TWR} {call-sign}, holding point Rwy-16, request line up for circuit.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Line up for circuit
calls.message: {call-sign}, circuit approved, line up Rwy-16, report ready for departure.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Lining up for circuit
calls.message: Lining up Rwy-16 for circuit, call you ready for departure, {call-sign}.

description: The pilot reports ready and receives takeoff clearance from the tower.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Ready for departure
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, ready for departure.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared for takeoff
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, s/w 210/06 kts, cleared for takeoff Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm takeoff
calls.message: s/w copied, cleared for takeoff Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: A call from the tower immediately after takeoff, instructing the pilot on their next reporting point for a standard departure.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Airborne, report 4000ft
calls.message: {Call Sign}, airborne {time}, report passing 4000ft

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Report 4000ft
calls.message: airborne copied, call you passing 4000ft {Call Sign}

description: This is a call made when a plane has flown far enough from the airport to be handed off from the airport's tower controller to the regional air traffic controller for the next part of its flight.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Passing 4000ft
calls.message: {JSR TWR} {Call Sign}, passing 4000ft

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Contact control
calls.message: {Call Sign}, contact dhaka control 126.7

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Wilco, contact control
calls.message: over to control, good day {Call Sign}

description: The pilot reports abeam a waypoint and requests to switch to the training frequency.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request change to training
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, we are abeam Z2, like to change to training.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Change approved
calls.message: Contact training.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm change to training
calls.message: Over to training, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports turning right and climbing, and awaits further instruction.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Turning right, climbing 3500ft
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, turning right, climbing to 3500 feet, stand by for estimate.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report setting course
calls.message: {Call Sign}, copied, report setting course.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report setting course
calls.message: Call you setting course, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports setting course and provides an estimate for a waypoint.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Setting course, estimate Alfadanga
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, setting course.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Roger, report 5 miles out
calls.message: {Call Sign}, roger, estimate Alfadanga at {40}, Report 5 miles out.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report 5 miles out
calls.message: Call you 5 miles out, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports being five miles out and is handed off to the training frequency.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: 5 miles out
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, 5 miles out.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Contact training
calls.message: {Call Sign}, contact training.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm contact training
calls.message: Over to training, {Call Sign}.

description: The helicopter pilot requests permission to start the engines.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request startup
calls.message: {JSR GRD}, {Call Sign}, request startup.

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.caption: Startup approved
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR GRD}, startup approved, temp 26, time {time 23}.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm startup
calls.message: Startup approved, temp 32, {time 23}, {Call Sign}.

description: The helicopter pilot requests permission to air taxi to R-P.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request air taxi
calls.message: {JSR GRD}, {Call Sign}, request air taxi to the R-P.

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.caption: Cleared for air taxi
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR GRD}, cleared for air taxi to R-P via Q, QNH 1012.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm air taxi
calls.message: Cleared for air taxi to the R-P via Q, QNH 1012, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot informs ground of their intention to operate in the circuit and requests to change to tower frequency.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request change to tower for circuit
calls.message: {JSR GRD}, {Call Sign}, we will operate in the circuit, request change to tower.

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.caption: Circuit copied, contact tower
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR GRD}, circuit copied, contact tower.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm contact tower
calls.message: Contacting tower, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot informs ground of their intention to operate 5 miles west and requests to change to tower frequency.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Request change to tower for 5 miles west
calls.message: {JSR GRD}, {Call Sign}, we will operate 5 miles west, request change to tower.

calls.speaker: GRD
calls.caption: 5 miles west copied, contact tower
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR GRD}, 5 miles west copied, contact tower.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm contact tower
calls.message: Contacting tower, {Call Sign}.

description: The helicopter pilot reports ready and receives takeoff clearance for circuit operations.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Ready for departure
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, ready for departure.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared for takeoff
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, surface wind 180 at 05 knots, cleared for takeoff Runway 16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm takeoff
calls.message: Wind copied, cleared for takeoff, {Call Sign}.

description: The helicopter pilot receives takeoff clearance to operate 5 miles west.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Ready for departure
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, ready for departure.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared for takeoff, report 5 miles west
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, after departure proceed 5 miles west, surface wind 180 at 05 knots, cleared for takeoff. Report reaching 5 miles west.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm takeoff
calls.message: Cleared for takeoff, will report 5 miles west, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports reaching the 5-mile west operating area.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Report 5 miles west
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, we are at 5 miles west.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Roger, report ops normal
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, roger. Report ops normal every 10 minutes.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm ops normal report
calls.message: Will report ops normal every 10 minutes, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot provides a periodic operational status update from the 5-mile west area.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Ops normal
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, 5 miles west, operations normal.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Ops normal copied
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, ops normal copied.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Roger
calls.message: Roger, {Call Sign}.
